title: How to Make a Candy Corn Milkshake

steps.headline: Scoop one-third of ice cream into a medium-sized bowl.
steps.description: Add a few drops of yellow food coloring and stir with a spoon until it resembles a light yellow color.

steps.headline: Scoop another one-third of ice cream into a separate bowl.
steps.description: Add a few drops of orange coloring and stir with a spoon until it resembles a light orange color. Feel free to add as much as food coloring as desired depending on the color you want the milkshake to be.

steps.headline: In a separate bowl, stir the remaining vanilla ice cream.
steps.description: Mix well until smooth and creamy.

steps.headline: Layer the candy corn milkshake.
steps.description: Scoop the yellow ice cream into a tall serving glass and gently pat it down with a spoon. Add the orange layer and then the white. The milkshake should not have any air bubbles. Try your best to smoothen it out as much as you can.

steps.headline: Add a dollop of whipped ice cream on top of the milkshake.
Serve.
steps.description: Garnish the milkshake with sprinkles and candy corn pieces, if desired. Enjoy!

steps.headline: Place the ice cream and milk inside an electric blender.
Add the candy corn, pumpkin puree, and banana.
Blend well on high speed for about 2-3 minutes.
steps.description: The milkshake should resemble a light orange color and should be creamy.

steps.headline: Pour the candy corn milkshake into serving glasses.
Serve.
steps.description: Garnish the milkshake with whipped cream or extra candy corn pieces. Enjoy!

text: Candy Corn Pattern Milkshake Scoop one-third of ice cream into a medium-sized bowl. Add a few drops of yellow food coloring and stir with a spoon until it resembles a light yellow color. Scoop another one-third of ice cream into a separate bowl. Add a few drops of orange coloring and stir with a spoon until it resembles a light orange color. Feel free to add as much as food coloring as desired depending on the color you want the milkshake to be. In a separate bowl, stir the remaining vanilla ice cream. Mix well until smooth and creamy. Layer the candy corn milkshake. Scoop the yellow ice cream into a tall serving glass and gently pat it down with a spoon. Add the orange layer and then the white. The milkshake should not have any air bubbles. Try your best to smoothen it out as much as you can. Add a dollop of whipped ice cream on top of the milkshake.  Serve. Garnish the milkshake with sprinkles and candy corn pieces, if desired. Enjoy! Candy Corn Flavored Milkshake Place the ice cream and milk inside an electric blender.  Add the candy corn, pumpkin puree, and banana.  Blend well on high speed for about 2-3 minutes. The milkshake should resemble a light orange color and should be creamy. Pour the candy corn milkshake into serving glasses.  Serve. Garnish the milkshake with whipped cream or extra candy corn pieces. Enjoy!
